items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Perfect dress for a Christmas party! The sleeves are not too long (love the flowy-ness at the end) and the length of the dress is perfect for petite and average height. The dress is soft and does not have an itchy layer from the lace, not see through either. I'm 5'1 and in my first trimester so also works great for a maternity dress! Read more
items.author: Paige Alhabeil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brown must have
items.body: This is one of my favorite dresses! The brown is so on trend for this season and it is so comfortable! Read more
items.author: Angela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress
items.body: Nice fit, good quality, nice material. True to size. Read more
items.author: Brandi Cassady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: I am 5’ 2” and just under 120 lbs and it fit perfectly for me, not too short or tight. I love the color pink and bought this for holidays! Read more
items.author: Ashopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and elegant dress!
items.body: I wore this dress for my engagement party and it was so beautiful yet comfortable. True to size but I sized up to have a little breathing room and was still very flattering. The sleeves are beautiful and there is lining underneath. I’m 5’3 195lbs (pregnant) and curvy 40DD and 44in hips I ordered an XL. Read more
items.author: Danielle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t love
items.body: Didn’t love this. Fell at a weird length on me. Read more
items.author: NANCY L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit different than pictured
items.body: Great dress! Thought it would be looser on the hips than it is. Very form fitting if you don’t have narrow hips. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow, Black, Dusty Blue, Brick Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
